00002 #define _ESM_LIGH_H

00004 #include "esm_reader.hpp"

00006 namespace ESM {
00007 
00008 /*
00009  * Lights. Includes static light sources and also carryable candles
00010  * and torches.
00011  */
00012 
00013 struct Light
00014 {
00015   enum Flags
00016     {
00017       Dynamic           = 0x001,
00018       Carry             = 0x002, // Can be carried
00019       Negative          = 0x004, // Negative light?
00020       Flicker           = 0x008,
00021       Fire              = 0x010,
00022       OffDefault        = 0x020, // Off by default
00023       FlickerSlow       = 0x040,
00024       Pulse             = 0x080,
00025       PulseSlow         = 0x100
00026     };
00027 
00028   struct LHDTstruct
00029   {
00030     float weight;
00031     int value;
00032     int time; // Duration
00033     int radius;
00034     int color; // 4-byte rgba value
00035     int flags;
00036   }; // Size = 24 bytes
00037 
00038   LHDTstruct data;
00039 
00040   std::string sound, script, model, icon, name;
00041 
00042   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00043   {
00044     model = esm.getHNString("MODL");
00045     name = esm.getHNOString("FNAM");
00046     icon = esm.getHNOString("ITEX");
00047     assert(sizeof(data) == 24);
00048     esm.getHNT(data, "LHDT", 24);
00049     script = esm.getHNOString("SCRI");
00050     sound = esm.getHNOString("SNAM");
00051   }
00052 };
00053 }
00054 #endif
